S2M-753 Malcolm Chisholm: The Draft National Health Service (Distribution of Endowment Income Scheme) (Scotland) Regulations 2004-That the Health Committee recommends that the draft National Health Service (Distribution of Endowment Income Scheme) (Scotland) Regulations 2004 be approved.
